SVGAnimatedRectBaseVal.summary: The baseVal read-only property of the interface represents the current non-animated value of the viewBox attribute of an SVG element.

remarks.para: This property reflects the SVG element's {{SVGAttr("viewBox")}} attribute value as a read-only object. It provides access to the static rectangle defined by the viewBox attribute, including the x, y, width, and height values.

SVGAnimatedRectBaseVal.value: A object representing the current non-animated value of the viewBox attribute.
